Warrior.name: Warrior
Warrior.desc: A melee class with high HP and defense, specialized in physical attacks.

Mage.name: Mage
Mage.desc: A ranged class proficient in elemental magic, fragile but capable of great destruction.

Thinker.name: Thinker
Thinker.desc: A ranged class proficient in elemental magic, fragile but capable of great destruction.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.desc: A ranged class proficient in elemental magic, fragile but capable of great destruction.
